title: Gildersleeve Initials Released
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders has just expanded it's Gildersleeve family as released on [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110401/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/gildersleeve/) with the addition of three sets of ornamental initials. Here's a preview:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gildersleeve%20Initials_5506.png)
author: Rasendyll
